line_1: Each brighter beam of Heaven exclude.
"And not as limits, meanly to exclude:
line_2: "When trees and streams were made a general good;

line_1: Which does thy wonted cheerfulness exclude?
line_2: Say, dear Almeda, why this pensive mood,

line_1: Pastime and bus'ness both it should exclude,
line_2: And bar the door the moment they intrude,

line_1: Religion does not censure or exclude
Now bid thy soul man's busy scenes exclude,
line_2: And view composed this silent multitude: —

line_1: Hence shall thy aweful seriousness exclude;
line_2: No foe to peace shall here intrude.

line_1: 'And from the rest I pray exclude
